Gopikrishna Arepalli

Software Engineer

Hello! I am an Under graduate in Electronies Engineering. Currently working as a Software Engineer with a strong background in Python, Pytest, Kubernetes and devops tools like Git, JIRA, Jenkin's.

From the past two years, I have been working in ASM Technologies Ltd as QA Engineer for Infoblox client which is a IT automation and security company based in California's Silicon Valley.

My responsiblites includes Writing testcases, Manual testing, Automation testing using Pytest, Creating Jenkin's CI jobs for auomated suite executions and JIRA bug tracking.
